PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-05552007-04-19,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1082 - FOOD ADDITIVES) by permitting certain additives that have already been approved for use in a wide variety of foods to be used in other food products as colouring, emulsifying, bulking or pH adjusting agents.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0075 Publication Date: 2007-05-02
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1082 - FOOD ADDITIVES) by permitting certain additives that have already been approved for use in a wide variety of foods to be used in other food products as colouring, emulsifying, bulking or pH adjusting agents.
